#=
   exp01 in eighths
=#
#=
# exp(0/8 .. 1/8 )
const p0to1ov8coeffs = FloatFloat{Float64}[
  FF(1.0, 0.0),
  FF(1.0, 0.0),
  FF(0.5, 0.0),
  FF(0.16666666666666666, 9.251858538542954e-18),
  FF(0.041666666666666664, 2.312964634641769e-18),
  FF(0.008333333333333333, 1.156482308530367e-19),
  FF(0.001388888888888889, -5.3005366652310616e-20),
  FF(0.0001984126984126984, 1.6820770595940774e-22),
  FF(2.48015873015873e-5, 1.6387256300696712e-22),
  FF(2.7557319223985854e-6, -9.170956931150971e-23),
  FF(2.7557319223992966e-7, -7.680459342800713e-24),
  FF(2.5052108384450854e-8, 2.8542014391448986e-27),
  FF(2.08767570899069e-9, 9.029325813278772e-27),
  FF(1.6059036206320366e-10, -2.233062281236155e-27),
  FF(1.1471148423325486e-11, 7.01157566701164e-28),
  FF(7.63295031577968e-13, -4.3036175749963783e-29),
  FF(5.0792421079500086e-14, -2.5132946739281802e-30)
  ];
const exp0to1ov8 = Poly(p0to1ov8coeffs);

# exp(1/8 .. 2/8 )
const p1to2ov8coeffs = FloatFloat{Float64}[
  FF(1.0, 8.867782650815699e-28),
  FF(1.0, -8.529088918944551e-26),
  FF(0.5, 3.8454411617817696e-24),
  FF(0.16666666666666666, 9.251750599368515e-18),
  FF(0.041666666666666664, 2.315077215575876e-18),
  FF(0.008333333333333333, 8.505334563908058e-20),
  FF(0.0013888888888888892, 6.964420338656209e-20),
  FF(0.00019841269841269546, 6.523138118671071e-21),
  FF(2.4801587301607583e-5, 1.2911574465706952e-21),
  FF(2.755731922287412e-6, -8.69325426569932e-23),
  FF(2.755731927253329e-7, -5.7180456503176125e-24),
  FF(2.5052106706576778e-8, -2.0094254584163632e-25),
  FF(2.0876802389115906e-9, -4.2832583018489664e-26),
  FF(1.6058104455779936e-10, -9.105524799169274e-27),
  FF(1.1485088253352906e-11, -6.519014767614366e-28),
  FF(7.495353214181705e-13, 1.2802972065514587e-29),
  FF(5.764836863814681e-14, 2.374183553698351e-30)
  ];
const exp1to2ov8 = Poly(p1to2ov8coeffs);

# exp(2/8 .. 3/8 )
const p2to3ov8coeffs = FloatFloat{Float64}[
  FF(1.0, 8.163703129246973e-24),
  FF(1.0, -4.529944022206224e-22),
  FF(0.5, 1.1812020819280091e-20),
  FF(0.16666666666666666, 9.059633673095655e-18),
  FF(0.04166666666666667, -2.439409916768831e-18),
  FF(0.008333333333333314, 7.497873981012597e-19),
  FF(0.0013888888888890084, 7.693849704787176e-21),
  FF(0.0001984126984120908, -4.9318899410788164e-21),
  FF(2.4801587304039794e-5, -4.484584734483484e-22),
  FF(2.755731914494527e-6, 4.837102084898277e-23),
  FF(2.755732125756744e-7, -6.725763031138458e-24),
  FF(2.5052066869738664e-8, 1.3071158745045489e-24),
  FF(2.0877420875150966e-9, 1.509991465950054e-25),
  FF(1.605091113668957e-10, 2.991451300987646e-27),
  FF(1.1544290040457077e-11, 1.1202702579822875e-28),
  FF(7.186864770689674e-13, -3.240798731209672e-29),
  FF(6.532415843627498e-14, -3.1561208710768616e-30)
  ];
const exp2to3ov8 = Poly(p2to3ov8coeffs);

# exp(3/8 .. 4/8 )
const p3to4ov8coeffs = FloatFloat{Float64}[
  FF(1.0, 3.0564510164802533e-21),
  FF(1.0, -1.198619474280957e-19),
  FF(0.5, 2.2101872190473796e-18),
  FF(0.16666666666666663, 1.1557616848534274e-17),
  FF(0.04166666666666687, -9.042670886093892e-19),
  FF(0.008333333333332109, -6.356799171810962e-20),
  FF(0.0013888888888945144, -9.534657880051275e-20),
  FF(0.00019841269839242223, 9.608662554812824e-21),
  FF(2.4801587359646663e-5, 1.5075036450094139e-21),
  FF(2.755731789598082e-6, 1.7412822727592264e-22),
  FF(2.7557343480696065e-7, 6.226457673849566e-24),
  FF(2.5051756760172094e-8, -8.505489591084594e-25),
  FF(2.0880749416348454e-9, 1.103695136772245e-25),
  FF(1.6024333919480354e-10, -1.1233637999063457e-26),
  FF(1.1693225962390125e-11, -5.636258016841351e-28),
  FF(6.663345315672208e-13, -1.9381106176609326e-29),
  FF(7.402196908048188e-14, 5.7383464413269716e-30)
  ];

# exp(7/8 .. 8/8 )

  FF(1.0000000000000022, 9.907946013128191e-18),
  FF(0.9999999999999596, -8.32639904194931e-18),
  FF(0.5000000000003445, 4.8200180785675464e-17),

const exp0to8ov8 = [exp0to1ov8,exp1to2ov8,exp2to3ov8,exp3to4ov8,
                    exp4to5ov8,exp5to6ov8,exp6to7ov8,exp7to8ov8];
=#
#=
   exp01 in eighths
=#   
# exp(0/8 .. 1/8 )
exp0to1ov8(x) = @horner(x,
  FF(1.0, 0.0),
  FF(1.0, 0.0),
  FF(0.5, 0.0),
  FF(0.16666666666666666, 9.251858538542954e-18),
  FF(0.041666666666666664, 2.312964634641769e-18),
  FF(0.008333333333333333, 1.156482308530367e-19),
  FF(0.001388888888888889, -5.3005366652310616e-20),
  FF(0.0001984126984126984, 1.6820770595940774e-22),
  FF(2.48015873015873e-5, 1.6387256300696712e-22),
  FF(2.7557319223985854e-6, -9.170956931150971e-23),
  FF(2.7557319223992966e-7, -7.680459342800713e-24),
  FF(2.5052108384450854e-8, 2.8542014391448986e-27),
  FF(2.08767570899069e-9, 9.029325813278772e-27),
  FF(1.6059036206320366e-10, -2.233062281236155e-27),
  FF(1.1471148423325486e-11, 7.01157566701164e-28),
  FF(7.63295031577968e-13, -4.3036175749963783e-29),
  FF(5.0792421079500086e-14, -2.5132946739281802e-30)
  );
#const exp0to1ov8 = Poly(p0to1ov8coeffs);

# exp(1/8 .. 2/8 )
exp1to2ov8(x) = @horner(x,
  FF(1.0, 8.867782650815699e-28),
  FF(1.0, -8.529088918944551e-26),
  FF(0.5, 3.8454411617817696e-24),
  FF(0.16666666666666666, 9.251750599368515e-18),
  FF(0.041666666666666664, 2.315077215575876e-18),
  FF(0.008333333333333333, 8.505334563908058e-20),

# exp(4/8 .. 5/8 )

  FF(1.0, 2.5558000711263893e-19),

# exp(5/8 .. 6/8 )

  FF(1.0, 8.877893859524011e-18),

  FF(0.008333333332973909, -2.4478060200219384e-19),

# exp(6/8 .. 7/8 )
exp6to7ov8(x) = @horner(x, 
  FF(1.0000000000000002, -4.9223886126515946e-17),
  FF(0.9999999999999963, 4.576888093672128e-17),
  FF(0.5000000000000356, -1.296088767326531e-17),
  FF(0.16666666666644755, -1.0207179457446227e-17),
  FF(0.0416666666676095, -2.1673798416786068e-18),

# exp(7/8 .. 8/8 )
exp7to8ov8(x) = @horner(x,
  FF(1.0000000000000022, 9.907946013128191e-18),
  FF(0.9999999999999596, -8.32639904194931e-18),
  FF(0.5000000000003445, 4.8200180785675464e-17),
  FF(0.1666666666648321, -1.2475899666489967e-17),
  FF(0.041666666673500004, 1.2224920326030992e-18),
  FF(0.008333333314440538, -7.798281327857522e-19),
  FF(0.001388888929031947, 6.266346432937523e-20),
  FF(0.00019841263147183765, 1.147210509320239e-20),
  FF(2.4801675968349673e-5, -1.1513413095464316e-21),
  FF(2.7556381426994193e-6, 8.435746015447332e-23),
  FF(2.756523437463303e-7, 2.6256509295213692e-23),
  FF(2.4999153573645156e-8, 2.566740228189005e-25),
  FF(2.1153693213753617e-9, 9.254929951953874e-26),
  FF(1.4953984537825774e-10, -9.31093045915562e-27),
  FF(1.4700618850051894e-11, 1.359152025990859e-27),
  FF(1.2226715592497332e-13, 2.3889534823833134e-30),
  FF(1.220415949418186e-13, 1.4876249029317642e-30)
  );
#const exp7to8ov8 = Poly(p7to8ov8coeffs);

const exp0to8ov8 = [exp0to1ov8,exp1to2ov8,exp2to3ov8,exp3to4ov8,
                    exp4to5ov8,exp5to6ov8,exp6to7ov8,exp7to8ov8];

function exp0to1(x::FloatFloat{Float64})
    idx = trunc(Int,ldexp(x,3));
    exp0to8ov8[1+idx](x)
end
#=
function exp0to1(x::FloatFloat{Float64})
    idx = trunc(Int,ldexp(x,3));
    polyval(exp0to8ov8[1+idx], x)
end
=#
# relerr seems to stay within 8e-32
function exp(x::FloatFloat{Float64})
   if signbit(x)
       return inv(exp(-x))
   end
   fpart, fipart = modf(x)
   ipart = trunc(Int,fipart)
   if ipart<513
      fpart = exp0to1(fpart)
      if ipart != 1
          exp0to512[ipart+1] * fpart
      else      # double-double(exp(1)) * fpart, add in triple-double(exp(1)) least sig part * fpart.hi
          FF(2.718281828459045, 1.4456468917292502e-16)*fpart + (-2.1277171080381768e-33*fpart.hi) 
      end
   else
      throw(ErrorException("value too large"))
   end
end

exp(x::FloatFloat{Float32}) = convert(FloatFloat{Float32}, exp(FloatFloat{Float64}(x)))

#=
  sollya DD approximation to exp(x) for x in [0-1/4096, 1/64+1/4096]
  prec=500;
  f=exp(x)
  deg=12;
  dom=[-1/4096;1/64+1/4096];
  p=fpminimax(f,deg,[|DD...|],dom);
  errmax = max( sup(supnorm(p,f,dom,relative,2^(-107))),
                sup(supnorm(p,f,dom,absolute,2^(-107))) ); # < 5.0e-41
  
  coeffs0_12 = FloatFloat{Float64}[
  FF( ldexp(1.0, 0), ldexp(0.0, 0) ),
  FF( ldexp(1.0, 0), ldexp(0.0, 0) ),
  FF( ldexp(1.0, -1), ldexp(0.0, 0) ),
  FF( ldexp(6004799503160661.0, -55), ldexp(3002399751580249.0, -108) ),
  FF( ldexp(6004799503160661.0, -57), ldexp(3002399752085687.0, -110) ),
  FF( ldexp(4803839602528529.0, -59), ldexp(1200957307266633.0, -113) ),
  FF( ldexp(6405119470038039.0, -62), ldexp(-68689818467887.0, -110) ),
  FF( ldexp(7320136537186329.0, -65), ldexp(5139340895772781.0, -119) ),
  FF( ldexp(915017067148395.0, -65), ldexp(-736051865938283.0, -122) ),
  FF( ldexp(3253394016209229.0, -70), ldexp(-1976431996659763.0, -125) ),
  FF( ldexp(2602715374302483.0, -73), ldexp(4174156016494107.0, -127) ),
